title: Add GitHub-ready root README.md for DarkPattern Shield

requirements.summary: Create a repository-root README.md documenting the DarkPattern Shield project, routes, local development (DFX + frontend), Internet Identity auth experience, and source export workflow.
acceptanceCriteria: A new file `README.md` exists at the repository root (not under `frontend/`).
README.md is valid, fully-rendered Markdown (no broken/truncated code fences).
README.md includes a section listing the appâ€™s main pages and their routes: `/`, `/detector`, `/risk-test`, `/report`, `/extension`.
README.md includes local run instructions that reference using DFX to start the local IC network and deploy canisters, and instructions to run the frontend dev server from the `frontend/` directory.
README.md includes a short, user-facing description of Internet Identity authentication (no third-party auth providers).

README.md includes an export section referencing `frontend/scripts/export-source-code.sh`, `frontend/scripts/export-source-code.ps1`, the `export/` output folder, and that `frontend/SOURCE_CODE_EXPORT.md` is copied into the archive root as `README_EXPORT.md`.

file_operations.description: Add a GitHub-ready, English README for DarkPattern Shield including: project overview; key routes/pages (`/`, `/detector`, `/risk-test`, `/report`, `/extension`) with brief descriptions; prerequisites (Node.js, pnpm, DFX); local development steps for the Internet Computer canister (`dfx start`, `dfx deploy`) and for running the React frontend dev server from `frontend/`; a brief, high-level user experience note on authentication via Internet Identity; and instructions to export/download the full source using `frontend/scripts/export-source-code.sh` and `frontend/scripts/export-source-code.ps1`, noting output to `export/` and that `frontend/SOURCE_CODE_EXPORT.md` is copied into the archive root as `README_EXPORT.md`.
